I know that parts need colliders, but I'm confused about colliders for IVAs. are they needed? For instance, the crew cab I built has a floor, do I need a collider for the floor? What about colliders for the sides of the cab, are they needed?

Here's a reference:

http://i.imgur.com/EAyQXBn.jpg

Thanks for the help.

Internals do not need colliders. Kerbals can't move around in them. If you use props the props need colliders. Or internal cameras to say look out a window. Anything that you want to click (a prop) needs one but nothing else does.
